quest.name: Tentacles of Trade
journal:
Zukin is a Kojin with a new purpose for old chests.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Inspect octopus traps near the Adventure and obtain an octopus.
Deliver the giant koromo octopus to Zukin.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: We had some old treasure chests that were lying around, gathering dust. With some creativity on my part, I was able to convert them into octopus traps. And they work exceptionally well, if I may say so myself.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Now, I've a mind to gift the good folk of Kokajiya with a fresh catch, and I should be grateful if you could go out and inspect the traps.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: I've laid three over by the wreck southwest of here. One is bound to have caught an octopus by now. My thanks in advance, Forename.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There is nothing in this chest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There is a mess of writhing tentacles in the chest!

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are. Did the kami bless us with a catch?

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Oho, such a large and lively octopus! Our blacksmith friends shall be pleased!

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: By the way, did I mention that older chests wreathed in weeds make the best traps? Well, they do. You may wish to remember this for your future reference.
